mapper.select: select * from v_pcmrecruitment t1 where pcmrecruitmentid=#{id}
select * from v_pcmrecruitment t1 where pcmrecruitmentid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t41.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t11.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`PCMRECRUITMENTID`, t1.`PCMRECRUITMENTNAME`, t1.`RECRUITMENTTYPE`, t1.`REQUIREMENTS`, t1.`SFZPWC`, t1.`SJZPRS`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YJZPRS` FROM `T_PCMRECRUITMENT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t11 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t11.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t41 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t41.ORMDUTYID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ORMDUTYID, t41.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t11.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.PCMRECRUITMENTID, t1.PCMRECRUITMENTNAME, t1.RECRUITMENTTYPE, t1.REQUIREMENTS, t1.SFZPWC, t1.SJZPRS, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.YJZPRS FROM T_PCMRECRUITMENT t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t11 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t11.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t41 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t41.ORMDUTYID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ORMDUTYID`, t41.`ORMDUTYNAME`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t21.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t1.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `ORMORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORMPOSTID`, t11.`ORMPOSTNAME`, t1.`PCMRECRUITMENTID`, t1.`PCMRECRUITMENTNAME`, t1.`RECRUITMENTTYPE`, t1.`REQUIREMENTS`, t1.`SFZPWC`, t1.`SJZPRS`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`YJZPRS` FROM `T_PCMRECRUITMENT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t11 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t11.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t41 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t41.ORMDUTYID WHERE ( t1.`RECRUITMENTTYPE` = '30' )

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ORMDUTYID, t41.ORMDUTYNAME, t1.ORMORGID, t21.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t1.ORMORGSECTORID, t31.ORGSECTORNAME AS ORMORGSECTORNAME, t1.ORMPOSTID, t11.ORMPOSTNAME, t1.PCMRECRUITMENTID, t1.PCMRECRUITMENTNAME, t1.RECRUITMENTTYPE, t1.REQUIREMENTS, t1.SFZPWC, t1.SJZPRS, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.YJZPRS FROM T_PCMRECRUITMENT t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMPOST t11 ON t1.ORMPOSTID = t11.ORMPOSTID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t21 ON t1.ORMORGID = t21.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.ORMORGSECTORID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORMDUTY t41 ON t1.ORMDUTYID = t41.ORMDUTYID WHERE ( t1.RECRUITMENTTYPE = '30' )
